name: One With The Woods
description:
This is a survival top down Run'n'gun that has you fighting waves of enemies with your bow and only arrow. Made with the prompt "only one"

WASD - Movement
Space - Dash
Shift - Hold to sprint
Mouse - Aim
Left click - hold to charge, release to shoot
Right click - Cancel attack
Esc - Restart

Hope you like it and feel free to leave us any comment or review. :)
